description: This file defines a React functional component called Header, which renders a header bar with user info, notifications icon, and logout functionality. It interacts with the application's Redux store to access user data and to dispatch a logout action.

methods.name: Header
methods.description: React functional component rendering the header UI with user info and logout button.

methods.name: handleLogout
methods.description: Dispatches the logout action when the user clicks the logout button.
